channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:45 Alarm lifted in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 18:45 Alarm lifted in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages. #Zhytomyr_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 18:42 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 18:42 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 18:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 18:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 18:18 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
